text: I'm very new at using HubSpot CMS and I've been tasked with adding links to the top of this page. I need some assistance in finding out where to go to do this? Here is the link:Â <https://blog.socialstudies.com/>
Hey Gary, based on the screenshot it looks like you will need to find the sections within the "Header" module at the top.

<@U2H1Q3F8R> I'm not sure what to click on next, I don't want to mess anything up. This environment is very intimidating to me but I really want to understand it more. I really appreciate the input.:+1::blush:
Each section matches the section of the website - You can see the logo module in the center. The modules on the left and right of the logo would be the sections that you are trying to edit.
